landing.365: 365% APR: special Airdrop for EmiSwap Liquidity Providers on Polygon. Available only if LP tokens are staked with ESW in Farming pools.
landing.1000: Farming pools with up to 1000% APR to multiply your rewards.
landing.025: 0.25% of the trading volume in any pool is distributed between Liquidity Providers.

about.title: About EmiSwap
about.subtitle: EmiSwap is an audited cross-chain AMM with higher rewards for LPs than on any other DEX.

list.2: Available on Polygon, Ethereum, and KuCoin Blockchain

1.title: Connect your wallet
1.subtitle: EmiSwap supports MetaMask, Coinbase, Fortmatic, Portis & more

2.title: Pick a pool
2.subtitle: Use ‘Add Liquidity’ tab to supply crypto to the pool, e.g. USDT & ESW

3.title: Get LP tokens
3.subtitle: LP tokens are issued automatically. Use them to farm & earn even more

4.title: Start earning
4.subtitle: Use the ‘Farming’ tab to stake LP tokens & earn $ESW rewards every 13 seconds

polygon.title: Earn 1% a day on EmiSwap Polygon with 0 effort
polygon.text: All LPs on EmiSwap Polygon are eligible for the unique 365% APR airdrop. Connect wallet, add liquidity to any pool – and get a daily 1% return until October 31, 2022. The first reward distribution is on February 3, 2022.

p.1: Smart Farming allows you to get 365% APR on your LP token plus an additional percentage (XXX%) on staked LP-ESW tokens in Farming pool.
p.3: Staking your LP tokens with ESW into the farming pool will make you eligible for getting a 365% APR! It doesn’t end there, as you get an extra 0.25% of the pool’s trading fees as a liquidity provider.
p.4: The 365% APR will be allocated to all farmers three months after the campaign has ended or after users remove liquidity.

list.1: Provide liquidity for any pair and get LP tokens
list.2: Stake your LP tokens in pair with ESW tokens in Farming pool
list.4: Get XXX% APR on your LP+ESW tokens in Farming pool
